Name: Unblocking
About the game: Unblocking is a casual VR game based on dragging piece blocks to clear lines/boards. It supports 3 game modes: Puzzle (multiple levels to complete by clearing all blocks on the boards) Relax (time based mode which extends its countdown based on the number of lines completed) Arcade (make lines of different colors using all the available pieces before the time runs out in order to avoid the loss of lifes)
Meta Title: Unblocking: Feb 9, 2023, Displaced Bits and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Unblocking? Check out the release date (Feb 9, 2023), developer insights from Displaced Bits, and a complete game summary.
